About Me

Just to let you know a little bit about me...

Bio

Computer group user support specialist, Web Developer who is interested in learning a whole bunch of modern web technologies for building various full stack applications. I would be delighted to work on a variety of projects using React on the front-end and NodeJS with Express or PHP with Laravel on the back-end.
